page.title: 08HAVANT ATHLETIC CLUB
page.content: A Mr. Stockly formed the club in the 1920s for his daughters who were interested in sport.They formed a relay team and used to challenge other family teams. They never lost. It was closed in the 1930s when the daughters lost interest. In 1978 Mr. Ellis and Mr. Lovett put Warblington and Hayling Schools athletics teams together and formed the Havant Athletic Club.Now the younger children use Warblington or Hayling School for training. In Winter they do X_country and in Summer track and field and road running.They meet on Tuesdays and Thursdays for training The Club is soon to get a new track next to the incinerator near IBM .Havant Athletic Club competes in the Southern League Division 3(Women) and Division 4(Men).
